text: Mwyngloddfa Castell is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion, west Wales. The two special features are metal tolerant (Metallophyte) Lichens and mineral veins exposed in mines and tunnels. ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion == References == Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion
title: Mwyngloddfa Castell
